mapper.insert: INSERT INTO advert (publicationDate, district, address, floor, maxFloor, rooms, sq, price, withPublicServices, conditions, description, trustRate) VALUES (#{publicationDate}, #{district}, #{address}, #{floor}, #{maxFloor}, #{rooms}, #{sq}, #{price}, #{withPublicServices}, #{conditions}, #{description}, #{trustRate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM advert WHERE #{timestamp} > publicationDate ORDER BY publicationDate DESC limit #{limit}
SELECT min(price) as priceMin, max(price) as priceMax FROM advert
